name: analyze_clinical_decision_tree_tool
description: Specialized tool for analyzing clinical decision trees and medical workflow diagrams. ONLY use for: clinical decision trees, medical flowcharts, diagnostic algorithms, treatment pathways, clinical protocols, medical workflow diagrams, patient care pathways, and healthcare decision-making diagrams. NOT for: general diagrams, tables, handwriting, or non-medical content. If no clinical decision tree is found, returns that no clinical content was detected and suggests checking with user for appropriate tool selection.

image_path.description: S3 URL (s3://bucket/key) or absolute file path to the image. Use this OR image_data, not both.

image_data.description: Base64-encoded image data. Use this OR image_path, not both. Preferred when image is already in memory.

aws_profile.description: Optional AWS profile name for Bedrock authentication. If not provided, uses default AWS credentials
